title: Sidewall, "Tulips, Lovely Tulips", 1952
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Repeating design of growing pair of tulips, with a vining tendril, on which is perched a butterfly. Printed in colors on a blue ground. Printed in selvedge: "R.C. a Paris Made in France".

participants.person_name: The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, "Tulips, Lovely Tulips", 1952.
1952. Block-printed on continuous paper. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-8.
